## Requirement Reference
- **Requirement ID:** FR#LUR-6
- **Source Document:** Requirement/Functional/V1/2#LookupReterival/FR#LUR-6 - Get Availability Plan Type Details.md

## Description
System should allow retrieval of availability plan type details.

## Request/Response
- **Request:** AvailabilityPlanTypeID (guid)
- **Response:** AvailabilityPlanTypeID, Name, DisplayName

## User Roles
- Master Admin
- Practice Admin
- Tech Team Panel Member
- TA Team Admin
